output.sentences: The dog jumped into the lake.
All of the dogs jumped in the lake and started to swim.
It was the birthday of the dog with the colorful scarf.
The men in the visors were there to celebrate and brought their cameras to take pictures.
After swimming, everyone stood in the shady trees to relax and enjoy the day.
